name: Droidlog
short_description: DroidLog BETA is a real time logcat reader for Android. The application can be used to check various log messages generated inside the device which are not viewable by an user. It also has option to filter the log messages according to info, verbose, debug, warn and error. In addition to logcat reader the application also reads out the selected log item from the list and also features option for viewing the detailed information about the device such as OS info, CPU info, Device data etc as well as network information.
summary: An interactive logcat reader for Android with Text to Speech integrati
